title: SelectOption Props
description: See the MenuItem section of the Menu documentation for additional props that may be passed.

children.description: Anything which can be rendered in a select option (React component or element)

className.description: Classes applied to root element of select option

description.description: Description of the option (React component or element)

hasCheckbox.description: Indicates the option has a checkbox

icon.description: Render option with icon (React component or element)

isExternalLink.description:
Render an external link icon on focus or hover, and set the link's
"target" attribute to a value of "_blank".

value.description: Identifies the component in the Select onSelect callback (Type: any)
